== 1.1 / 1.2 ==

  * [DataTypes Ordered Set (ZSET)]
  * [MultiBulkCommands Multibulk Commands]
  * In memory integer encoding of [DataTypes integers]. Memory saving of 20% or more with datasets using high number of integer IDs. 
  * Enhanced [ExpireCommand EXPIRE] algorithm.
